snippet: Brussels police detained a man with suspected militant links who was found to be carrying two gas cylinders in his car after he was pulled over on Thursday for running a red light, officials said....

headline.main: The Surprisingly Lively Home of a Controversial Artist
headline.print_headline: The Surprisingly Lively Home of a Controversial Artist

lead_paragraph: Brussels police detained a man with suspected militant links who was found to be carrying two gas cylinders in his car after he was pulled over on Thursday for running a red light, officials said.
